feed.title: Separated bitcoin-consensus mailing list (was Re: Bitcoin XT Fork)

entry.title: Separated bitcoin-consensus mailing list (was Re: Bitcoin XT Fork)
entry.summary: It is suggested that every mailing list should have its own internal SNR discussions. In August, Jorge Tim√≥n made the most number of posts with 72, followed by Hector Chu with 36 and Thomas Zander with 32. Pieter Wuille posted 27 times, while Eric Lombrozo and Mark Friedenbach each had 24 posts. Adam Back, Btc Drak, and Peter Todd all had 18 posts while jl2012 had 17 and odinn with 16. Gavin Andresen had 15 posts while Venzen Khaosan and Michael Naber both had 12. Anthony Towns had 11 posts and Tom Harding and Gregory Maxwell each had 10. Anybody else on the mailing list had less than 10 posts in August.
